data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Anker, Arthur (2017): A new deep-water species of Alpheopsis Coutière, 1897 from the Indo-West Pacific (Decapoda: Alpheidae). Zootaxa 4226 (4): 571-580, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4226.4.7|8 occurrences
